Body:
s = UNITS.second
m = UNITS.meter
init = State(y=2 * m)
system = System(init=init, t_0=1 * s, t_end=3 * s)
def slope_func(state, t, system):
    [y] = state
    dydt = y + t
    return [dydt]
results, details = run_solve_ivp(system, slope_func)
y_end = get_last_value(results.y)
self.assertAlmostEqual(y_end, 25.5571533)
